intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Reflect on your progress with each self-care element, capture insights about what you've learned, and revise your plan for continued growth.

pleaseElements.title: Physical Illness
pleaseElements.prompt: How have you been managing your physical health, medical appointments, and prescribed medications? What patterns do you notice between your physical health and emotional wellbeing?

pleaseElements.title: Balance Sleep
pleaseElements.prompt: How has your sleep schedule consistency affected your mood and energy levels? What sleep habits have been most helpful or challenging?

pleaseElements.title: Balanced Eating
pleaseElements.prompt: How have your eating patterns and meal timing impacted your emotional stability? What connections do you notice between nutrition and mood?

pleaseElements.title: Avoid Mood-Altering Substances
pleaseElements.prompt: How have you been managing substances that affect your mood? What triggers or situations make it harder to avoid these substances?

pleaseElements.title: Adequate Sleep
pleaseElements.prompt: How has the quality and quantity of your sleep been supporting your emotional regulation? What bedtime routines or sleep practices have been most effective?

pleaseElements.title: Regular Exercise
pleaseElements.prompt: How has physical movement and activity been contributing to your mood and stress levels? What types of movement feel most beneficial for your wellbeing?

additionalSections.title: Overall Insights & Learning
additionalSections.prompt: What patterns do you notice across all PLEASE areas? What have you learned about your self-care needs and how they connect to your emotional wellbeing?
additionalSections.placeholder: Write about any patterns, insights or learnings from your self-care reflection...

additionalSections.title: Revised Plan for Next Period
additionalSections.prompt: Based on your reflections and insights, what specific adjustments do you want to make to your self-care plan? What will you prioritize?
additionalSections.placeholder: Write your revised self-care plan and specific goals for the coming period
